26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_SHARED_BUFFER_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_SHARED_BUFFER_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include <TiledArray/size_array.h>
30 
31 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_DEFAULT_ALIGNMENT
32 #define TILEDARRAY_DEFAULT_ALIGNMENT 16
33 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ALIGNMENT
34 
35 namespace TiledArray {
36 namespace detail {
37 
39 
43 template <typename T>
44 class ValArray : private SizeArray<T> {
45  public:
46  typedef ValArray<T> ValArray_;
47  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::size_type size_type;
48  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::value_type value_type;
49  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::reference reference;
50  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::const_reference
51  const_reference;
52  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::pointer pointer;
53  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::const_pointer
54  const_pointer;
55  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::difference_type
56  difference_type;
57  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::iterator iterator;
58  typedef typename SizeArray<T>::const_iterator
59  const_iterator;
60 
61  static const std::size_t alignment = TILEDARRAY_DEFAULT_ALIGNMENT;
62 
63  private:
64  mutable madness::AtomicInt* counter_;
65 
66  template <typename U>
67  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<U>>::type default_construct(
68  const size_type, U* MADNESS_RESTRICT) {}
69 
70  template <typename U>
71  typename std::enable_if<!detail::is_scalar_v<U>>::type default_construct(
72  const size_type n, U* MADNESS_RESTRICT u) {
73  size_type i = 0ul;
74  try {
75  for (; i < n; ++i) new (u + i) U();
76  } catch (...) {
77  math::destroy_vector(i, u);
78  throw;
79  }
80  }
81 
82  void deallocate() {
83  if (counter_) {
84  const int count = (*counter_)--;
85  if (count == 1) {
86  math::destroy_vector(SizeArray<T>::size(), SizeArray<T>::begin());
87  free(counter_);
88  }
89  }
90  }
91 
92  void init(const size_type n) {
93  typedef std::integral_constant<
94  size_type,
95  sizeof(madness::AtomicInt) +
96  ((alignment - (sizeof(madness::AtomicInt) & (alignment - 1ul))) &
97  ~alignment)>
98  sizeof_aligned_atomic_int;
99 
100  // Allocate buffer
101  void* buffer = NULL;
102  if (posix_memalign(
103  &buffer, alignment,
104  (n * sizeof(value_type)) + sizeof_aligned_atomic_int::value) != 0)
105  throw std::bad_alloc();
106 
107  // Initialize counter
108  counter_ = reinterpret_cast<madness::AtomicInt*>(buffer);
109  new (counter_) madness::AtomicInt;
110  *counter_ = 1;
111 
112  // Initialize the array
113  pointer const array = reinterpret_cast<pointer>(
114  reinterpret_cast<char*>(buffer) + sizeof_aligned_atomic_int::value);
115  SizeArray<T>::set(array, n);
116  }
117 
118  public:
119  ValArray() : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {}
120 
121  explicit ValArray(const size_type n) : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
122  init(n);
123  default_construct(n, SizeArray<T>::data());
124  }
125 
126  template <typename Value, typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<
127  value_type, Value>::value>::type* = nullptr>
128  ValArray(const size_type n, const Value& value)
129  : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
130  init(n);
131  math::uninitialized_fill_vector(n, value, SizeArray<T>::data());
132  }
133 
134  template <typename Arg>
135  ValArray(const size_type n, const Arg* const arg)
136  : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
137  init(n);
138  math::uninitialized_copy_vector(n, arg, SizeArray<T>::data());
139  }
140 
141  template <typename Arg, typename Op>
142  ValArray(const size_type n, const Arg* MADNESS_RESTRICT const arg,
143  const Op& op)
144  : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
145  init(n);
146  math::uninitialized_unary_vector_op(n, arg, SizeArray<T>::data(), op);
147  }
148 
149  template <typename U, typename Op>
150  ValArray(const ValArray<U>& arg, const Op& op)
151  : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
152  init(arg.size());
153  math::uninitialized_unary_vector_op(arg.size(), arg.data(),
154  SizeArray<T>::data(), op);
155  }
156 
157  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op>
158  ValArray(const size_type n, const Left* MADNESS_RESTRICT const left,
159  const Right* MADNESS_RESTRICT const right, const Op& op)
160  : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
161  init(n);
162  math::uninitialized_binary_vector_op(n, left, right, SizeArray<T>::data(),
163  op);
164  }
165 
166  template <typename U, typename V, typename Op>
167  ValArray(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right, const Op& op)
168  : SizeArray<T>(), counter_(NULL) {
169  TA_ASSERT(left.size() == right.size());
170  init(left.size());
171  math::uninitialized_binary_vector_op(left.size(), left.data(), right.data(),
172  SizeArray<T>::data(), op);
173  }
174 
175  ValArray(const ValArray_& other)
176  : SizeArray<T>(const_cast<pointer>(other.begin()),
177  const_cast<pointer>(other.end())),
178  counter_(other.counter_) {
179  if (counter_) (*counter_)++;
180  }
181 
182  ValArray_& operator=(const ValArray_& other) {
183  if (counter_ != other.counter_) {
184  // Cache pointers from other
185  madness::AtomicInt* const counter = other.counter_;
186  pointer const first = const_cast<pointer>(other.begin());
187  pointer const last = const_cast<pointer>(other.end());
188 
189  // Increment the reference counter for other
190  if (counter) (*counter)++;
191 
192  // Destroy this object
193  deallocate();
194 
195  // Set the data
196  counter_ = counter;
197  SizeArray<T>::set(first, last);
198  }
199 
200  return *this;
201  }
202 
203  ~ValArray() { deallocate(); }
204 
205  // Import SizeArray interface
206 
207  using SizeArray<T>::begin;
208  using SizeArray<T>::end;
209  using SizeArray<T>::rbegin;
210  using SizeArray<T>::rend;
211  using SizeArray<T>::operator[];
212  using SizeArray<T>::at;
213  using SizeArray<T>::front;
214  using SizeArray<T>::back;
215  using SizeArray<T>::size;
216  using SizeArray<T>::empty;
217  using SizeArray<T>::max_size;
218  using SizeArray<T>::data;
219  using SizeArray<T>::assign;
220  using SizeArray<T>::binary;
221  using SizeArray<T>::unary;
222  using SizeArray<T>::reduce;
223  using SizeArray<T>::row_reduce;
224  using SizeArray<T>::col_reduce;
225  using SizeArray<T>::outer;
226  using SizeArray<T>::outer_fill;
227 
228  // ValArray wrappers for vector operations
229 
231 
241  template <typename U, typename Op>
242  void binary(const ValArray<U>& arg, const Op& op) {
243  TA_ASSERT(arg.size() == SizeArray<T>::size());
244  SizeArray<T>::binary(arg.data(), op);
245  }
246 
248 
259  template <typename U, typename V, typename Op>
260  void binary(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right, const Op& op) {
261  TA_ASSERT(left.size() == SizeArray<T>::size());
262  TA_ASSERT(right.size() == SizeArray<T>::size());
263  SizeArray<T>::binary(left.data(), right.data(), op);
264  }
265 
267 
276  template <typename U, typename Op>
277  void unary(const ValArray<U>& arg, const Op& op) {
278  TA_ASSERT(arg.size() == SizeArray<T>::size());
279  SizeArray<T>::unary(arg.data(), op);
280  }
281 
283 
295  template <typename U, typename Result, typename Op>
296  Result reduce(const ValArray<U>& arg, Result& result, const Op& op) {
297  TA_ASSERT(arg.size() == SizeArray<T>::size());
298  return SizeArray<T>::reduce(arg.data(), result, op);
299  }
300 
302 
314  template <typename U, typename V, typename Op>
315  void row_reduce(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right,
316  const Op& op) {
317  TA_ASSERT(left.size() == (SizeArray<T>::size() * right.size()));
318  SizeArray<T>::row_reduce(right.size(), left.data(), right.data(), op);
319  }
320 
322 
331  template <typename U, typename Op>
332  void row_reduce(const ValArray<U>& arg, const Op& op) {
333  TA_ASSERT((arg.size() % SizeArray<T>::size()) == 0ul);
334  SizeArray<T>::row_reduce(arg.size() / SizeArray<T>::size(), arg, op);
335  }
336 
338 
350  template <typename U, typename V, typename Op>
351  void col_reduce(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right,
352  const Op& op) {
353  TA_ASSERT(left.size() == (SizeArray<T>::size() * right.size()));
354  SizeArray<T>::col_reduce(right.size(), left.data(), right.data(), op);
355  }
356 
358 
367  template <typename U, typename Op>
368  void col_reduce(const ValArray<U>& arg, const Op& op) {
369  TA_ASSERT((arg.size() % SizeArray<T>::size()) == 0ul);
370  SizeArray<T>::col_reduce(arg.size() / SizeArray<T>::size(), arg, op);
371  }
372 
374 
386  template <typename U, typename V, typename Op>
387  void outer(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right, const Op& op) {
388  TA_ASSERT(SizeArray<T>::size() == (left.size() * right.size()));
389  SizeArray<T>::outer(left.size(), right.size(), left.data(), right.data(),
390  op);
391  }
392 
394 
406  template <typename U, typename V, typename Op>
407  void outer_fill(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right,
408  const Op& op) {
409  TA_ASSERT(SizeArray<T>::size() == (left.size() * right.size()));
410  SizeArray<T>::outer_fill(left.size(), right.size(), left.data(),
411  right.data(), op);
412  }
413 
415 
428  template <typename U, typename V, typename A, typename Op>
429  void outer_fill(const ValArray<U>& left, const ValArray<V>& right,
430  const ValArray<A>& a, const Op& op) {
431  TA_ASSERT(SizeArray<T>::size() == (left.size() * right.size()));
432  TA_ASSERT(a.size() == SizeArray<T>::size());
433  SizeArray<T>::outer_fill(left.size(), right.size(), left.data(),
434  right.data(), a.data(), op);
435  }
436 
437  void swap(ValArray_& other) {
438  std::swap(counter_, other.counter_);
439  pointer const first = other.begin();
440  pointer const last = other.end();
441  other.set(begin(), end());
442  SizeArray<T>::set(first, last);
443  }
444 
445  // Comparison operators
446  template <typename U>
447  bool operator==(const ValArray<U>& other) const {
448  return SizeArray<T>::operator==(other);
449  }
450 
451  template <typename U>
452  bool operator!=(const ValArray<U>& other) const {
453  return SizeArray<T>::operator!=(other);
454  }
455 
457 
460  template <typename Archive,
461  typename = std::enable_if_t<
462  madness::archive::is_output_archive<Archive>::value>>
463  void serialize(Archive& ar) const {
464  // need to write size first to be able to init when deserializing
465  ar& size() & madness::archive::wrap(data(), size());
466  TA_ASSERT(counter_ == NULL || *counter_ == 1);
467  }
468 
470 
473  template <typename Archive,
474  typename = std::enable_if_t<
475  madness::archive::is_input_archive<Archive>::value>>
476  void serialize(Archive& ar) {
477  size_t sz = 0;
478  ar& sz;
479  init(sz);
480  ar& madness::archive::wrap(data(), size());
481  }
482 
483 }; // class ValArray
484 
485 template <typename T>
486 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os,
487  const ValArray<T>& val_array) {
488  print_array(os, val_array);
489  return os;
490 }
491 
492 } // namespace detail
493 } // namespace TiledArray
